name: Idle Dungeon Core
description: The world has long since reached an age of prosperity and growth. This was caused by the appearance of dungeons, places of wealth, and adventure. But not all dungeons are like that, you as a newly awakened dungeon core, born with only one objective: "Growth". You have to kill adventures and grow through the energy earned by killing them for the adventurers only grow stronger for each party that you kill.
